name: qwen-image-understanding
title: Image Analysis with Qwen Vision
description: Analyze and describe images using Qwen's powerful vision-language model.
extendedDescription: Unlock deep image understanding with Qwen's state-of-the-art vision-language model. This workflow enables you to ask questions about images, generate detailed descriptions, extract text via OCR, and analyze visual content with remarkable accuracy. Perfect for automating image cataloging, accessibility features, and content analysis pipelines.
howToUse: Enter your question or analysis prompt
Select the analysis mode (description, Q&A, or OCR)
Run the workflow to get AI-generated insights
Export results as text or structured data
metaDescription: Analyze images with Qwen Vision in ComfyUI. Free workflow template for AI-powered image understanding and captioning.

faqItems.question: Does this require an API key?
faqItems.answer: Yes, this workflow uses cloud APIs. You'll need a Qwen API key configured in your environment.

faqItems.question: What languages does Qwen Vision support?
faqItems.answer: Qwen Vision supports multiple languages including English, Chinese, and many others for both input and output.
